root.name: The 4th Unit
root.description: OverviewThe 4th Unit is the first entry in a series of Sci-Fi adventure games developed by DataWest. The game was originally released in 1987 for the PC-88 but was later ported to several other Japanese computers. An English fan translation of the X68000 and FM Towns versions of The 4th Unit are currently being worked on by rom hacking veterans EsperKnight and Filler.
